The Network Survey+ app requires a couple permissions to work. Denying these permissions will result in the app not functioning properly. 

1. Access this Device's Location: This app creates a log file which includes the location at which the cellular record was captured. 

2. Access Photos, Media, and Files on Your Device: This permission allows the log file to be written.
The Network Survey+ Service runs when the app needs to do work in the background such as write to the log file or stream data out over active connection
